issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Problem

A user can have multiple profiles that could be used to sign their app, even though they need a particular one to be used. Consider doing an adhoc build of an app using Urban Airship. The user has a generic team profile that does not include their push notification provisions, but they also have a specific profile that includes push notifications. Left alone, XCode is not choosing the best profile.

Workaround

The user edits their generated XCode project, changing the CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY to be what they want it to be.

Feature

Expose CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY through the tiapp.xml so that the user can specify which profile should be used.

Associated Helpdesk Ticket

http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/72201

{html}

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress since the opening of the ticket. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
